items.name: Bean Burrito
items.description: A Monster Burrito Black Beans, Cheese, Rice, Onions and Peppers. Served with Guacamole, Cilantro, Sour Cream, Salsa and More Black Beans.

items.name: Chicken Burrito

items.description: Grilled Flour Tortilla Filled with Melted Cheese, Green Onions and Chiles. Garnished with Guacamole, Salsa and Sour Cream with Hummus.

items.name: Beef Taco

items.name: Chicken Taco
items.description: Soft Corn Tortillas Filled with Spicy Chicken, Cheese, Tomato, Avocado, Onion, Chipotle and Cilantro. Served with Rice and Beans.

items.name: Fish Taco
items.description: Soft Corn Tortillas Filled with Grilled or Crispy Beer Battered Fish, Avocado, Tomato, Chipotle Sauce, Marinated Onions and Cilantro. Served with Rice and Beans.

items.description: Sweet Pork Wrapped With with Sour Cream, Salsa, Avocado and Salsa Verde.
